alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Licking (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 11:31AM EDT until May 08 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers... South Fork Licking River below I 70 near Buckeye Lake. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Fork Licking River below I 70 near Buckeye Lake. * WHEN...Until late Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 881.0 feet, The Route 79 eastbound exit is likely closed due to high water, with water also encroaching onto the edge of eastbound outer lane of Interstate 70. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 880.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Sunday morning and continue falling to 871.9 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 880.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
